All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Game
This class combines the game page(frame) and the game panel(drawing).
GamePage
This is the Frame of the game page, containing the icon, title, and holding the drawing(GamePanel.java)
GamePanel
this class contains all the components of the character, including the characters
Global
This is the Global class which holds most of the static variables and methods
KeyboardInputs
This class is for receiving all the input from the keyboard and give data to GamePanel.java to control the character
Main
This is the main method that the computer will open at first
MenuPage
This class is the menu page for the game (the page before the game officially starts).
SettingPage
 
TitlePage
This class is the title page (the page that appears the first) of the program, it will display the game name and author and also accompanying with three buttons: "start", "setting", and "exit"
